contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionarypar|BA|Ba|ba}} '''BA''', '''Ba''', or '''ba''' may refer to: * [[Bachelor of Arts]] * [[Bashkir language]]'s ISO 639 alpha-2 language code * [[Beerenauslese]], German late-harvest wine {{TOC right}} ==Companies and organizations== * [[Bangladesh Army]] * [[Boeing]] stock symbol * [[British Airways]], IATA airline designator * [[British Association for the Advancement of Science]] * [[Selskap med begrenset ansvar]], a type of Norwegian company with limited liability ==People== * [[Ba (surname)]] * [[Ba (given name)]] * [[B. A. Baracus]], a character from the television series ''The A-Team'' and the 2010 film based on the series * [[Demba Ba]], a Senegalese footballer that plays for Chelsea FC * [[Ibrahim Ba]], a former football player * [[Business analyst]] ==Places== * [[Ba (town)]], a town in Fiji ** [[Ba District, Fiji]], an administrative district in Fiji ** [[Ba Province]], Fiji ** [[Ba (Open Constituency, Fiji)]] ** [[Ba River (Fiji)]] * [[Ba (state)]], a Chinese vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1045 - 256 BCE) * [[Ba River (China)]] * [[Ba (Ljig)]], village in Serbia * [[Ba (village)]], village in [[Tha Tum]], Surin Province, Thailand * [[Bahrain]]'s FIPS 10-4 country code * [[Barber County, Kansas]]' state county code * [[Province of Bari]], ISO 3166-2:IT code * [[BA postcode area]], the Bath postcode area in south west England * [[Bosnia and Herzegovina]]'s ISO 2-letter country code ** [[.ba]], the top-level domain for Bosnia and Herzegovina * [[Boston and Albany Railroad]]'s reporting mark * [[Bratislava]], Slovakia * [[Buenos Aires]], Argentina * [[The Bahamas]], WMO country code ==Science== * [[Barium]], chemical symbol Ba * Ba Solem, a genus of land snails in the family [[Charopidae]] * [[barye]], the cgs unit of pressure * [[6-Benzylaminopurine]], plant hormone * [[Benzylamine]] * [[Blood alcohol content|Blood Alcohol content]] ==Sports== * [[Ba F.C.]] <!-- found in [[OFC Champions League 2007]] --> * [[Basketball Australia]] * [[Batting average]], a statistic in cricket and baseball ==Technology== * [[Badass (bridges)]], guitar bridge trade name of Leo Quan * Balanced armature, a type of [[Headphones#Balanced armature|headphone technology]] * [[British Association screw threads]], a largely obsolete standard for small screw threads * [[Buoyancy aid]], a personal flotation device * [[Ford BA Falcon]], an Australian car * [[NZR Ba class|NZR B<sup>A</sup> class]], a steam locomotive classification used by the New Zealand Railways Department ==Other== * [[Ba (Egyptian soul)]], one part of the ancient Egyptian concept of the soul * [[Ba game]] ==See also== *[[Ya ba]], tablets containing a mixture of methamphetamine and caffeine *[[BAA (disambiguation)]] *[[The Nottingham Bluecoat Academy]], a blue coat school in Nottingham, United Kingdom {{disambig}}
